logs in with valid credentials and stores token
rejects invalid credentials
registers a new user successfully

specs.title: handles registration form validation errors
prevents duplicate user registration
does not allow registration with weak password
does not allow registration with missing username
does not allow registration with missing email
does not allow registration with missing password
validates username format requirements
shows error for already registered email with different username
does not allow registration with extremely long username
does not allow registration with extremely long email
does not allow registration with special characters in username
does not allow registration with spaces in password
does not allow registration with uppercase email if system is case-insensitive
does not allow registration with script tags in username (XSS)
VULN DEMO: direct DOM XSS injection (manual)
